page.title: 10Gorton Community Centre
page.content: Gorton Community Centre has been running for eight years. It is small, well established and very friendly. Daytime activities include pre-school playgroups, womens keep fit, mums and tots afternoons, indoor bowls, and an over 50's club. The social work and welfare rights officer calls on a Thursday afternoon. Evening activities include indoor bowls, keep fit, junior and senior youth clubs, a club for the mentally handicapped and a disco for 7_14 year olds on a Friday evening. The Centre works with local schools to do comunity work. I like the Centre.It is good fun.I'm cooking on 27th June.I'm going to take my own ingredients and then take the buns home to share.You can play games like cluedo,dominoes and cards. There is a man who is 74 years old who plays table tennis. He is good.
